update.title: Version 5.11.2.15 is available
update.text: * Automatically attempt to reconnect if the device is disconnected

update.title: Version 5.11.2.14 is available
update.text: * Add automatic self-updater * Add API to persist last set colors * Allow up to 512 LEDs for Adalight * Fix wizard sending too much data

update.title: Version 5.11.2.13 is available
update.text: * Support F.lux and similar programs * Add API sound commands

update.title: Version 5.11.2.12 is available
update.text: * Color calibration page in wizard * Fix tray icon * macOS performance * API fix

update.title: Version 5.11.2.11 is available
update.text: * Extend custom distribution * Fix custom offset/rotation not saved * Reinitialize device after resume

update.title: Version 5.11.2.10 is available
update.text: * Extend custom distribution * Fix UI/settings bugs * Fix white balance ignored by luminosity * Fix lights turning on themselves

update.title: Version 5.11.2.9 is available
update.text: * Windows: Add sound visualizer * Add custom distribution to wizard * Option to increase grab brightness * Fix a crash on multiple screens * Fix wizard finds no devices

update.title: Version 5.11.2.8 is available
update.text: * Grab widgets snap to each other * Toggle blue LED * Update Checker

update.title: Version 5.11.2.7 is available
update.text: * Fix API compatiblity * Improved layout for high dpi screens * Handling of standby * DDupl: no-access handling
